arts.ttl: Bochum secure first win of the season with dominant display against Heidenheim
arts.sum: Bochum secured their first win of the season with a 2-0 victory over Heidenheim, Moritz Broschinski and Matúš Bero converting their side's dominance to spark survival hopes for the Bundesliga's bottom club. Matúš Bero celebrates his crucial second goal that extended Bochum's lead - IMAGO/Ulrich Hufnagel

arts.ttl: Bochum's first-half blitz secures victory over Heidenheim
arts.sum: A relegation six-pointer was on the cards this Sunday afternoon as VfL Bochum welcomed Heidenheim. In the end, the hosts secured a vital 2-0 win.

arts.ttl: Heidenheim vs. Bochum preview: Relegation rivals face off
arts.sum: Two relegation rivals will go toe-to-toe when Heidenheim welcome Bochum to the Voith-Arena for Sunday’s Bundesliga contest.

arts.ttl: Preview: VfL Bochum vs. Heidenheim - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Bundesliga clash between VfL Bochum and Heidenheim, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
